author: vmassol
msg: Fixed "exclude" bug. Thanks to Thomas Diesler.

author: vmassol
msg: Added a junit test example to the simple java sample. Hope it has not become too complex ;-)

author: vmassol
msg: Make sure that test failures or errors do not stop the generation of the Clover reports.

author: vmassol
msg: The maven.test.failure.ignore property is forced to true during the execution of the tests (so that report generation do not fail if the tests fail) but it is not reset to its initial value aftewards, thus causing issues for other plugins thereafter relying on it.
